TEXT: e1: The death penalty is a legal means that as such is not practicable in Germany.
CN RELATION: death penalty, legal means (IsA)/death penalty, practicable in Germany (NotHasProperty)/death penalty, Germany (NotAtLocation)

TEXT: e2: For one thing, inviolable human dignity is anchored in our constitution,
CN RELATION: human dignity, inviolable (HasProperty)/inviolable human dignity, constitution (PartOf)/inviolable human dignity, anchored in our constitution (HasProperty)

TEXT: e3: and furthermore no one may have the right to adjudicate upon the death of another human being.
e4: Even if many people think that a murderer has already decided on the life or death of another person,
CN RELATION: people, think (CapableOf)/murderer, decide on life or death (CapableOf)/murderer, decide on life or death (CapableOf)/be a murderer, decide on life or death (HasPrerequisite)

TEXT: e5: this is precisely the crime that we should not repay with the same.
